name: 高源远
bio_zh: 我目前是西北工业大学硕士三年级(2023-至今)，我目前在上海人工智能实验室进行项目合作(2025.2-至今)。我的研究方向包括大场景重建, 多模态空间理解。
bio_en: I am currently a third-year Master's student at Northwestern Polytechnical University (2023–present), and I have been working as an intern at the Shanghai Artificial Intelligence Laboratory since February 2025. My research interests include large-scale scene reconstruction and multimodal spatial understanding.
